SEARCH
Package game.actions.tradeactions

Class TradeAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
game.actions.tradeactions.TradeAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyAction, SellAction
public abstract class TradeAction extends Action
An abstract class representing what would happen during a trade. This includes how the transaction happens and every TradeActions stores the price, the original price, the item to be traded and the chance for a special event to occur. Created by:
